properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 4:24AM EST until January 9 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 knots and waves 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to midnight EST Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT
